physics.title: Physics Fundamentals
physics.description: Master the core concepts of physics including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism with hands-on experiments and real-world applications.

physics.title: Advanced Physics
physics.description: Dive deep into advanced physics topics including quantum mechanics, relativity, and nuclear physics with comprehensive problem-solving techniques.

physics.title: A Level / O Level Physics Exam Prep
physics.description: Focused exam preparation for A Level and O Level Physics: past paper practice, marking schemes, and timed mock exams.

mathematics.title: Mathematics Fundamentals
mathematics.description: Build a strong foundation in mathematics covering algebra, geometry, trigonometry, and basic calculus with step-by-step problem-solving approaches.

mathematics.title: Advanced Mathematics
mathematics.description: Master advanced mathematical concepts including calculus, linear algebra, and differential equations with applications in science and engineering.

mathematics.title: A Level / O Level Mathematics Exam Prep
mathematics.description: Targeted A/O-Level maths preparation: worked solutions, past paper walkthroughs, and exam strategy workshops.

biology.title: Biology Fundamentals
biology.description: Explore the fundamentals of life sciences including cell biology, genetics, ecology, and human physiology with interactive experiments and visual learning.

biology.title: Advanced Biology
biology.description: Advance your knowledge in molecular biology, biotechnology, immunology, and evolutionary biology with research-oriented learning approaches.

chemistry.title: Chemistry Fundamentals
chemistry.description: Learn the basics of chemistry including atomic structure, chemical bonding, reactions, and laboratory techniques with hands-on virtual experiments.

chemistry.title: Advanced Chemistry
chemistry.description: Master advanced chemistry topics including physical chemistry, analytical chemistry, and biochemistry with industrial applications and research methods.

chemistry.title: A Level / O Level Chemistry Exam Prep
chemistry.description: Practical and theory-focused exam prep for A/O-Level Chemistry including laboratory report techniques and past paper practice.

english.title: English Language & Literature
english.description: Develop strong English language skills including grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, and literary analysis with interactive writing exercises.

english.title: Advanced English Studies
english.description: Master advanced English skills including academic writing, critical analysis, rhetoric, and professional communication for higher education and careers.

computer_science.title: Computer Science Fundamentals
computer_science.description: Introduction to computer science covering programming basics, algorithms, data structures, and computational thinking with practical coding exercises.

economics.title: Economics Fundamentals
economics.description: Learn the principles of microeconomics and macroeconomics with real-world applications, case studies, and current economic analysis.

geography.title: Geography & Earth Sciences
geography.description: Explore physical and human geography, environmental science, and earth systems with maps, case studies, and field-based learning approaches.
